siblings.name: LUX PLUS | LUX MAX | LUX-M | ASP | MPD | ARES

name: STEALTH
description:
<p><strong>As Smooth As Satin</strong></p>

<p>Finally, a paint protection film specifically formulated for preserving protecting a flat factory finish. Whether your vehicle is matte, magno, frozen or frosted, XPEL STEALTH will keep it looking effortlessly pristine. Or, give your gloss paint a whole new look!</p>
pagetitle: XPEL | Paint Protection Film | STEALTH Satin Finish Paint Protection | Self-Healing Clear Bra
metakeywords: STEALTH, satin wrap, clear bra, paint protection, matte wrap, frosted wrap, frozen paint
metadescription: Need to protect a factory flat finish, or want an updated look? XPEL STEALTH offers the same self-healing you get from ULTIMATE PLUS paint protection, but with a silky, satin finish.
